channel.title: My first photoshop creation(ever), No Tut Used
channel.description:
Well, i downloaded photoshop, and right when it was done, i made this sig... its my first time using photoshop, so it kinda sucks... the only part that i got from something else was the image of link and Midna from the Legend of Zelda: twilight princess... I made the background and found a nooby way to change the text opacity... lol...
[IMG]http://i70.photobucket.com/albums/i113/vartankid/Zelda.png[/img]
